product_name: SEPHORA COLLECTION Color Flush Lip And Cheek Stick Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Good for a cute summer sheer lipstick but too greasy and sticky for your cheeks. Cute colors tho

product_name: SEPHORA COLLECTION Color Flush Lip And Cheek Stick Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Gray', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: I like these for a nice protective lip shine. Light, sheer color and keeps lips moist. Too slick for my oily cheeks.

product_name: SEPHORA COLLECTION Color Flush Lip And Cheek Stick Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Reminiscent of the old Tarte cheek stain which I was obsessed with. This is sheer and perfect for summer. Slightly sticky but it works for a dewey sheen.

product_name: SEPHORA COLLECTION Color Flush Lip And Cheek Stick Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I love to wear these as natural lip tint/balm. They are very glossy, I wouldn’t wear it on my cheeks unless I needed a waterproof blush. At first I was skeptical, but I ended up loving both the colors, the coral is more of a pink with a peachy tint. They are bigger than the regular lip-balm size so they aren’t as convenient for traveling/purses.

product_name: SEPHORA COLLECTION Color Flush Lip And Cheek Stick Set
user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I found the formula to be too greasy and too sheer for color payoff. While I was aware it was sheer, the dewiness is a grease that eventually separates, wears away, and just looks shiny. It works very well as a chapstick and color was cute in pink, not so much in orange. All in all the value didn't fit the bill so I'm returning.

product_name: SEPHORA COLLECTION Color Flush Lip And Cheek Stick Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: i LOVE bright, sheer, cheek tints in STICK form. my absolute favorite was actually the discontinued NYX hydrating sheer cheek tint and i’ve been looking for an acceptable replacement for at least 6 months. i was thrilled to see sephora offer these! they’re almost as good as the NYX, the only downside is that they remain a tiny bit sticky on your cheeks whereas the NYX did not.

product_name: SEPHORA COLLECTION Color Flush Lip And Cheek Stick Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: This feels like a lip balm. It is a sheer wash of color and imparts a slight stain on your lips when it wears off. It gives the cheeks a youthful glow. More natural looking, not intense color. I love it!

product_name: SEPHORA COLLECTION Color Flush Lip And Cheek Stick Set
user_specs: ['Age over 54', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I want to love it, and will use it in the summet most likely on the beach or at the pool (it is perf for that). BUT it is essentially a gloss stick with very little pigment. It's 50/50 to me.
